#Instructions

= Here we go! =

dolphin-downloader is somewhat simple to use.
here is how to use it:
=== -----------------Stable download------------------- ===
ok first download THE NEWEST stable/Recommended archive from the downloads page!
click on it to extract it,
open terminal, type "perl " (with a space after perl)
then finally drag dolphindown.pl from the extracted from the download into the terminal window and press the enter or return key..
